table.name: rz_dashboard_statuschange
table.viewSql: SELECT p.processnumber, p.processtype AS process_name, p.startdatetime AS process_startdatetime, p.enddatetime AS process_enddatetime, p.durationtimehours AS process_durationtimehours, p.currentstatus AS process_currentstatus, sp.code AS statuschange_code, sp.name AS statuschange_name, sp.datetime AS statuschange_datetime, sp.processstatusgroupname AS statuschange_name_group, sp.userreferenceid AS statuschange_userid FROM (wlc.sz_processstatuschange sp LEFT JOIN wlc.sz_process p ON (((sp.processnumber)::text = (p.processnumber)::text))); SELECT p.processnumber, p.processtype AS process_name, p.startdatetime AS process_startdatetime, p.enddatetime AS process_enddatetime, p.durationtimehours AS process_durationtimehours, p.currentstatus AS process_currentstatus, sp.code AS statuschange_code, sp.name AS statuschange_name, sp.datetime AS statuschange_datetime, sp.processstatusgroupname AS statuschange_name_group, sp.userreferenceid AS statuschange_userid FROM (wlr.sz_processstatuschange sp LEFT JOIN wlr.sz_process p ON (((sp.processnumber)::text = (p.processnumber)::text))); SELECT p.processnumber, p.processtype AS process_name, p.startdatetime AS process_startdatetime, p.enddatetime AS process_enddatetime, p.durationtimehours AS process_durationtimehours, p.currentstatus AS process_currentstatus, sp.code AS statuschange_code, sp.name AS statuschange_name, sp.datetime AS statuschange_datetime, sp.processstatusgroupname AS statuschange_name_group, sp.userreferenceid AS statuschange_userid FROM (wls.sz_processstatuschange sp LEFT JOIN wls.sz_process p ON (((sp.processnumber)::text = (p.processnumber)::text)));

table.name: rz_pipeline_applications
table.viewSql: SELECT agr.referenceid AS agreement_id, process.code AS process_status_code, process.name AS process_status, process.processstatusgroupname AS process_status_group, date(process.datetime) AS process_status_date, fac.agreedlimitamount AS original_principal_amount, process.whitelabel AS originator, 'Link'::text AS servicer, bo.cnt AS no_of_borrowers, agr.mainborrowerreferenceid AS mainborrower_id, cp.legalentity AS mainborrower_legalentity, agr.startdate AS origination_date, (date((agr.startdate + ('1 mon'::interval * fac.fixedrateperiod))) - 1) AS end_interest_rate_fixing, fac.fixedrateperiod, fac.annualinterestrate AS interest_rate, fac.repaymenttype, col.no_of_collaterals_objects, col.object_place, col.object_postalcode, col.object_marketvalue, col.object_purchasevalue, fac.loantovalue AS ltv, fac.debtservicecoverageratio AS dscr, fac.interestcoveragerationarrow, fac.reversionmargininterestrate, fac.facilityduration, fac.borrowerfee AS upfrontborrowerfee, date(process.startdatetime) AS process_start_date, date(pevent.conditionalofferdate) AS conditionalofferdate, date(pevent.bindingofferdate) AS bindingofferdate, process.loanpassingdate AS process_passing_date FROM ((((((wlc.sz_agreement agr JOIN wlc.sz_counterparty cp ON (((cp.referenceid)::text = (agr.mainborrowerreferenceid)::text))) LEFT JOIN wlc.sz_facility fac ON (((fac.agreementreferenceid)::text = (agr.referenceid)::text))) LEFT JOIN wlc.sz_processevents pevent ON (((agr.processnumber)::text = (pevent.processnumber)::text))) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT sz_borrower.agreementreferenceid, count(DISTINCT sz_borrower.counterpartyreferenceid) AS cnt FROM wlc.sz_borrower GROUP BY sz_borrower.agreementreferenceid) bo ON (((bo.agreementreferenceid)::text = (agr.referenceid)::text))) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT cc.agreementreferenceid, cc.rank2 AS no_of_collaterals_objects, cc.place AS object_place, cc.postalcode AS object_postalcode, cc.marketvaluesum AS object_marketvalue, cc.purchasevaluesum AS object_purchasevalue FROM ( SELECT sz_collateral_object.referenceid, sz_collateral_object.created, sz_collateral_object.modified, sz_collateral_object.agreementreferenceid, sz_collateral_object.collateralreferenceid, sz_collateral_object.postalcode, sz_collateral_object.place, sz_collateral_object.marketvalue, sz_collateral_object.purchasevalue, rank() OVER (PARTITION BY sz_collateral_object.agreementreferenceid ORDER BY sz_collateral_object.marketvalue DESC) AS rank1, rank() OVER (PARTITION BY sz_collateral_object.agreementreferenceid ORDER BY sz_collateral_object.marketvalue) AS rank2, sum(sz_collateral_object.marketvalue) OVER (PARTITION BY sz_collateral_object.agreementreferenceid) AS marketvaluesum, sum(sz_collateral_object.purchasevalue) OVER (PARTITION BY sz_collateral_object.agreementreferenceid) AS purchasevaluesum FROM wlc.sz_collateral_object) cc WHERE (cc.rank1 = 1)) col ON (((agr.referenceid)::text = (col.agreementreferenceid)::text))) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ps.rownumber, ps.id, ps.code, ps.name, ps.datetime, ps.processnumber, ps.processstatusgroupname, ps.userreferenceid, p.processtype, p.whitelabel, p.startdatetime, p.loanpassingdate FROM (wlc.sz_process p LEFT JOIN ( SELECT row_number() OVER (PARTITION BY sz_processstatuschange.processnumber ORDER BY sz_processstatuschange.datetime DESC) AS rownumber, sz_processstatuschange.id, sz_processstatuschange.code, sz_processstatuschange.name, sz_processstatuschange.datetime, sz_processstatuschange.processnumber, sz_processstatuschange.processstatusgroupname, sz_processstatuschange.userreferenceid FROM wlc.sz_processstatuschange) ps ON ((((p.processnumber)::text = (ps.processnumber)::text) AND (ps.rownumber = 1))))) process ON (((process.processnumber)::text = (agr.processnumber)::text))) ORDER BY agr.referenceid; SELECT agr.referenceid AS agreement_id, process.code AS process_status_code, process.name AS process_status, process.processstatusgroupname AS process_status_group, date(process.datetime) AS process_status_date, fac.agreedlimitamount AS original_principal_amount, process.whitelabel AS originator, 'Link'::text AS servicer, bo.cnt AS no_of_borrowers, agr.mainborrowerreferenceid AS mainborrower_id, cp.legalentity AS mainborrower_legalentity, agr.startdate AS origination_date, (date((agr.startdate + ('1 mon'::interval * fac.fixedrateperiod))) - 1) AS end_interest_rate_fixing, fac.fixedrateperiod, fac.annualinterestrate AS interest_rate, fac.repaymenttype, col.no_of_collaterals_objects, col.object_place, col.object_postalcode, col.object_marketvalue, col.object_purchasevalue, fac.loantovalue AS ltv, fac.debtservicecoverageratio AS dscr, fac.interestcoveragerationarrow, fac.reversionmargininterestrate, fac.facilityduration, fac.borrowerfee AS upfrontborrowerfee, date(process.startdatetime) AS process_start_date, date(pevent.conditionalofferdate) AS conditionalofferdate, date(pevent.bindingofferdate) AS bindingofferdate, process.loanpassingdate AS process_passing_date FROM ((((((wlr.sz_agreement agr JOIN wlr.sz_counterparty cp ON (((cp.referenceid)::text = (agr.mainborrowerreferenceid)::text))) LEFT JOIN wlr.sz_facility fac ON (((fac.agreementreferenceid)::text = (agr.referenceid)::text))) LEFT JOIN wlr.sz_processevents pevent ON (((agr.processnumber)::text = (pevent.processnumber)::text))) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT sz_borrower.agreementreferenceid, count(DISTINCT sz_borrower.counterpartyreferenceid) AS cnt FROM wlr.sz_borrower GROUP BY sz_borrower.agreementreferenceid) bo ON (((bo.agreementreferenceid)::text = (agr.referenceid)::text))) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT cc.agreementreferenceid, cc.rank2 AS no_of_collaterals_objects, cc.place AS object_place, cc.postalcode AS object_postalcode, cc.marketvaluesum AS object_marketvalue, cc.purchasevaluesum AS object_purchasevalue FROM ( SELECT sz_collateral_object.referenceid, sz_collateral_object.created, sz_collateral_object.modified, sz_collateral_object.agreementreferenceid, sz_collateral_object.collateralreferenceid, sz_collateral_object.postalcode, sz_collateral_object.place, sz_collateral_object.marketvalue, sz_collateral_object.purchasevalue, rank() OVER (PARTITION BY sz_collateral_object.agreementreferenceid ORDER BY sz_collateral_object.marketvalue DESC) AS rank1, rank() OVER (PARTITION BY sz_collateral_object.agreementreferenceid ORDER BY sz_collateral_object.marketvalue) AS rank2, sum(sz_collateral_object.marketvalue) OVER (PARTITION BY sz_collateral_object.agreementreferenceid) AS marketvaluesum, sum(sz_collateral_object.purchasevalue) OVER (PARTITION BY sz_collateral_object.agreementreferenceid) AS purchasevaluesum FROM wlr.sz_collateral_object) cc WHERE (cc.rank1 = 1)) col ON (((agr.referenceid)::text = (col.agreementreferenceid)::text))) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ps.rownumber, ps.id, ps.code, ps.name, ps.datetime, ps.processnumber, ps.processstatusgroupname, ps.userreferenceid, p.processtype, p.whitelabel, p.startdatetime, p.loanpassingdate FROM (wlr.sz_process p LEFT JOIN ( SELECT row_number() OVER (PARTITION BY sz_processstatuschange.processnumber ORDER BY sz_processstatuschange.datetime DESC) AS rownumber, sz_processstatuschange.id, sz_processstatuschange.code, sz_processstatuschange.name, sz_processstatuschange.datetime, sz_processstatuschange.processnumber, sz_processstatuschange.processstatusgroupname, sz_processstatuschange.userreferenceid FROM wlr.sz_processstatuschange) ps ON ((((p.processnumber)::text = (ps.processnumber)::text) AND (ps.rownumber = 1))))) process ON (((process.processnumber)::text = (agr.processnumber)::text))) ORDER BY agr.referenceid; SELECT agr.referenceid AS agreement_id, process.code AS process_status_code, process.name AS process_status, process.processstatusgroupname AS process_status_group, date(process.datetime) AS process_status_date, fac.agreedlimitamount AS original_principal_amount, process.whitelabel AS originator, 'Link'::text AS servicer, bo.cnt AS no_of_borrowers, agr.mainborrowerreferenceid AS mainborrower_id, cp.legalentity AS mainborrower_legalentity, agr.startdate AS origination_date, (date((agr.startdate + ('1 mon'::interval * fac.fixedrateperiod))) - 1) AS end_interest_rate_fixing, fac.fixedrateperiod, fac.annualinterestrate AS interest_rate, fac.repaymenttype, col.no_of_collaterals_objects, col.object_place, col.object_postalcode, col.object_marketvalue, col.object_purchasevalue, fac.loantovalue AS ltv, fac.debtservicecoverageratio AS dscr, fac.interestcoveragerationarrow, fac.reversionmargininterestrate, fac.facilityduration, fac.borrowerfee AS upfrontborrowerfee, date(process.startdatetime) AS process_start_date, date(pevent.conditionalofferdate) AS conditionalofferdate, date(pevent.bindingofferdate) AS bindingofferdate, process.loanpassingdate AS process_passing_date FROM ((((((wls.sz_agreement agr JOIN wls.sz_counterparty cp ON (((cp.referenceid)::text = (agr.mainborrowerreferenceid)::text))) LEFT JOIN wls.sz_facility fac ON (((fac.agreementreferenceid)::text = (agr.referenceid)::text))) LEFT JOIN wls.sz_processevents pevent ON (((agr.processnumber)::text = (pevent.processnumber)::text))) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT sz_borrower.agreementreferenceid, count(DISTINCT sz_borrower.counterpartyreferenceid) AS cnt FROM wls.sz_borrower GROUP BY sz_borrower.agreementreferenceid) bo ON (((bo.agreementreferenceid)::text = (agr.referenceid)::text))) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT cc.agreementreferenceid, cc.rank2 AS no_of_collaterals_objects, cc.place AS object_place, cc.postalcode AS object_postalcode, cc.marketvaluesum AS object_marketvalue, cc.purchasevaluesum AS object_purchasevalue FROM ( SELECT sz_collateral_object.referenceid, sz_collateral_object.created, sz_collateral_object.modified, sz_collateral_object.agreementreferenceid, sz_collateral_object.collateralreferenceid, sz_collateral_object.postalcode, sz_collateral_object.place, sz_collateral_object.marketvalue, sz_collateral_object.purchasevalue, rank() OVER (PARTITION BY sz_collateral_object.agreementreferenceid ORDER BY sz_collateral_object.marketvalue DESC) AS rank1, rank() OVER (PARTITION BY sz_collateral_object.agreementreferenceid ORDER BY sz_collateral_object.marketvalue) AS rank2, sum(sz_collateral_object.marketvalue) OVER (PARTITION BY sz_collateral_object.agreementreferenceid) AS marketvaluesum, sum(sz_collateral_object.purchasevalue) OVER (PARTITION BY sz_collateral_object.agreementreferenceid) AS purchasevaluesum FROM wls.sz_collateral_object) cc WHERE (cc.rank1 = 1)) col ON (((agr.referenceid)::text = (col.agreementreferenceid)::text))) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ps.rownumber, ps.id, ps.code, ps.name, ps.datetime, ps.processnumber, ps.processstatusgroupname, ps.userreferenceid, p.processtype, p.whitelabel, p.startdatetime, p.loanpassingdate FROM (wls.sz_process p LEFT JOIN ( SELECT row_number() OVER (PARTITION BY sz_processstatuschange.processnumber ORDER BY sz_processstatuschange.datetime DESC) AS rownumber, sz_processstatuschange.id, sz_processstatuschange.code, sz_processstatuschange.name, sz_processstatuschange.datetime, sz_processstatuschange.processnumber, sz_processstatuschange.processstatusgroupname, sz_processstatuschange.userreferenceid FROM wls.sz_processstatuschange) ps ON ((((p.processnumber)::text = (ps.processnumber)::text) AND (ps.rownumber = 1))))) process ON (((process.processnumber)::text = (agr.processnumber)::text))) ORDER BY agr.referenceid;

table.name: rz_pipeline_borrowers
table.viewSql: SELECT borrow.agreementreferenceid AS agreement_id, cp.referenceid AS counterparty_id, cp.legalentity, cp.datelastchanged, cp.address, cp.postalcode, cp.isholding, cp.counterpartysegmentcode, cp.counterpartycategorycode, cp.organisationname, cp.numberofemployees, cp.cocnumber, cp.standardsectorcode, cp.legalform, cp.countrycode FROM (wlc.sz_counterparty cp JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT sz_borrower.counterpartyreferenceid, sz_borrower.agreementreferenceid FROM wlc.sz_borrower) borrow ON (((borrow.counterpartyreferenceid)::text = (cp.referenceid)::text))) ORDER BY borrow.agreementreferenceid; SELECT borrow.agreementreferenceid AS agreement_id, cp.referenceid AS counterparty_id, cp.legalentity, cp.datelastchanged, cp.address, cp.postalcode, cp.isholding, cp.counterpartysegmentcode, cp.counterpartycategorycode, cp.organisationname, cp.numberofemployees, cp.cocnumber, cp.standardsectorcode, cp.legalform, cp.countrycode FROM (wlr.sz_counterparty cp JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT sz_borrower.counterpartyreferenceid, sz_borrower.agreementreferenceid FROM wlr.sz_borrower) borrow ON (((borrow.counterpartyreferenceid)::text = (cp.referenceid)::text))) ORDER BY borrow.agreementreferenceid; SELECT borrow.agreementreferenceid AS agreement_id, cp.referenceid AS counterparty_id, cp.legalentity, cp.datelastchanged, cp.address, cp.postalcode, cp.isholding, cp.counterpartysegmentcode, cp.counterpartycategorycode, cp.organisationname, cp.numberofemployees, cp.cocnumber, cp.standardsectorcode, cp.legalform, cp.countrycode FROM (wls.sz_counterparty cp JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT sz_borrower.counterpartyreferenceid, sz_borrower.agreementreferenceid FROM wls.sz_borrower) borrow ON (((borrow.counterpartyreferenceid)::text = (cp.referenceid)::text))) ORDER BY borrow.agreementreferenceid;

table.name: rz_pipeline_collaterals
table.viewSql: SELECT col.agreementreferenceid AS agreement_id, col.referenceid AS collateral_id, col.definitioncode, col.description, col.valuationdate, col.valuationcurrency, col.valuationamount, colobj.referenceid AS collateral_object_id, colobj.postalcode AS object_postalcode, colobj.place AS object_place, colobj.marketvalue AS object_marketvalue, colobj.purchasevalue AS object_purchasevalue FROM (wlc.sz_collateral col LEFT JOIN wlc.sz_collateral_object colobj ON (((col.agreementreferenceid)::text = (colobj.agreementreferenceid)::text))); SELECT col.agreementreferenceid AS agreement_id, col.referenceid AS collateral_id, col.definitioncode, col.description, col.valuationdate, col.valuationcurrency, col.valuationamount, colobj.referenceid AS collateral_object_id, colobj.postalcode AS object_postalcode, colobj.place AS object_place, colobj.marketvalue AS object_marketvalue, colobj.purchasevalue AS object_purchasevalue FROM (wlr.sz_collateral col LEFT JOIN wlr.sz_collateral_object colobj ON (((col.agreementreferenceid)::text = (colobj.agreementreferenceid)::text))); SELECT col.agreementreferenceid AS agreement_id, col.referenceid AS collateral_id, col.definitioncode, col.description, col.valuationdate, col.valuationcurrency, col.valuationamount, colobj.referenceid AS collateral_object_id, colobj.postalcode AS object_postalcode, colobj.place AS object_place, colobj.marketvalue AS object_marketvalue, colobj.purchasevalue AS object_purchasevalue FROM (wls.sz_collateral col LEFT JOIN wls.sz_collateral_object colobj ON (((col.agreementreferenceid)::text = (colobj.agreementreferenceid)::text)));

column.name: referenceid
column.remarks: Source=CAS : Unique identifier of an agreement

column.name: created
column.remarks: moment of row creation

column.name: modified
column.remarks: moment of last update

column.name: whitelabel
column.remarks: Source=CAS : The whitelabel

column.name: mainborrowerreferenceid
column.remarks: Source=CAS : Unique identifier of a counterparty

column.name: startdate
column.remarks: Source=CAS : The start date of this credit agreement

column.name: enddate
column.remarks: Source=CAS : The end date of the agreement

column.name: reviewdate
column.remarks: Source=CAS : The review date of the agreement

column.name: agreementperfect
column.remarks: Source=CAS : Whether or not this credit agreement is perfect

column.name: datelastchanged
column.remarks: Source=CAS : The date the credit agreement was last changed (and lead to a new actual version of this credit agreement)

column.name: processnumber
column.remarks: FBL: Processnumber which generate the new agreement

table.name: sz_borrower
table.remarks: Associative table implementing the many-to-many relation between Agreement and Counterparty

column.name: referenceid
column.remarks: Source=CAS : Unique identifier of a borrower

column.name: created
column.remarks: moment of row creation

column.name: modified
column.remarks: moment of last update

column.name: agreementreferenceid
column.remarks: Source=CAS : Unique identifier of an agreement

column.name: counterpartyreferenceid
column.remarks: Source=CAS : Unique identifier of a counterparty

column.name: borrowerrelationtype
column.remarks: Source=CAS : Type of borrower relation (Main borrower or Borrower)

column.name: referenceid
column.remarks: Source=CAS : Unique identifier of a collateral

column.name: created
column.remarks: moment of row creation

column.name: modified
column.remarks: moment of last update

column.name: agreementreferenceid
column.remarks: Source=CAS : Unique identifier of an agreement

column.name: valuationdate
column.remarks: Source=CAS : Collateral > Valuation > ValuationDate

column.name: valuationcurrency
column.remarks: Source=CAS : The currency code for identification of the currency

column.name: valuationamount
column.remarks: Source=CAS : Collateral > Valuation > ValuationValue.

column.name: created
column.remarks: moment of row creation

column.name: modified
column.remarks: moment of last update

column.name: referenceid
column.remarks: Source=CAS : Unique identifier of a counterparty

column.name: created
column.remarks: moment of row creation

column.name: modified
column.remarks: moment of last update

column.name: legalentity
column.remarks: Source=CAS : Organisation (1) Personal (0)

column.name: datelastchanged
column.remarks: Source=CAS : Date of last change

column.name: address
column.remarks: Source=CAS : The address of the counterparty

column.name: postalcode
column.remarks: Source=CAS : TFree formatted postalcode, no specific country restrictions

column.name: isholding
column.remarks: Source=CAS : Derived information and indicaties if the counterparty is a Holding company

column.name: counterpartysegmentcode
column.remarks: Source=CAS : The segment code of this counterparty.

column.name: counterpartycategorycode
column.remarks: Source=CAS : The counterparty category this counterparty belongs to.

column.name: foundationdate
column.remarks: Source=CAS : The foundation date of the organisation

column.name: organisationname
column.remarks: Source=CAS : Name of the organisation

column.name: numberofemployees
column.remarks: Source=CAS : The number of employees of the organisation

column.name: cocnumber
column.remarks: Source=CAS : Chamber of commerce code

column.name: standardsectorcode
column.remarks: Source=CAS : The standard sector code linked to this counterparty.

column.name: legalform
column.remarks: Source=CAS : The legal form of a counterparty. Example values (nl): BV, NV, VOF. The values should correspond with the configured values in Force Business Lending.

column.name: countrycode
column.remarks: Source=CAS : The country code that matches with a country description. The list of country descriptions can differ per customer installation.

column.name: created
column.remarks: moment of row creation

column.name: modified
column.remarks: moment of last update

column.name: agreementreferenceid
column.remarks: Source=CAS : Unique identifier of an agreement

column.name: agreedlimitamount
column.remarks: Source=CAS : The agreed or contractual limit on top-facility level.

column.name: agreedlimitcurrency
column.remarks: Source=CAS : The currency code for identification of the currency

column.name: limitamount
column.remarks: Source=CAS : The amount of the limit

column.name: limitcurrency
column.remarks: Source=CAS : The currency code for identification of the currency

column.name: facilitystartdate
column.remarks: Source=CAS : The start date of the facility

column.name: facilityduration
column.remarks: Source=CAS : The duration of the facility

column.name: facilityenddate
column.remarks: Source=CAS : The end date of the facility

column.name: created
column.remarks: moment of row creation

column.name: modified
column.remarks: moment of last update

column.name: created
column.remarks: moment of row creation

column.name: modified
column.remarks: moment of last update

column.name: id
column.remarks: Unique identifier

column.name: created
column.remarks: moment of row creation

column.name: modified
column.remarks: moment of last update

column.name: counterpartyreferenceid
column.remarks: Source=FINAN : Unique identifier of a counterparty

column.name: statementdate
column.remarks: Source=FINAN : Statement date of the financial statement (Ultimo)

column.name: currency
column.remarks: Source=FINAN : The currency code for identification of the currency

column.name: totalturnover
column.remarks: Source=FINAN : Total turnover of the company

column.name: totalassets
column.remarks: Source=FINAN : Total assets of the company

column.name: ebitda
column.remarks: Source=FINAN : EBITDA of the company

column.name: debttoebitda
column.remarks: Source=FINAN : Debt to EBITDA of the company

column.name: referenceid
column.remarks: Source=CAS : Unique identifier of a financinggoal

column.name: created
column.remarks: moment of row creation

column.name: modified
column.remarks: moment of last update

column.name: agreementreferenceid
column.remarks: Source=CAS : Unique identifier of an agreement

column.name: definitioncode
column.remarks: Source=CAS : DefinitionCode

column.name: key
column.remarks: Label of the information

column.name: value
column.remarks: Value of the information

column.name: description
column.remarks: Description of the key, value pair.

column.name: type
column.remarks: INFO, FACT, ASSERT

column.name: created
column.remarks: moment of row creation

column.name: modified
column.remarks: moment of last update

column.name: created
column.remarks: moment of row creation

column.name: modified
column.remarks: moment of last update
